price: 40. ¡¿(Acaso Quien hace todo esto) no tendrá poder para resucitar a los muertos?!
arabic: أَلَيۡسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يُحۡـِۧيَ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: alaysa dhālika biqādirin ʿalā an yuḥ'yiya al-mawtā
